data.message: Where the album at slim? 😥😥 I'm going crazy waiting for this, my biggest anticipation of the year and my highlight, ey ain't gonna sit here n hate ur a perfectionist u wanna make it the best u can but broooo come on we need it soon, bet its done ur just being a cunt and seeing how impacient we get like dance puppets 😂😂 keep it real slim u saved my life man I rate u, this looks good tho I'll be watching this
